desc: Love handcrafted soaps and bath treats? Get your new favorite bath and body goodies at Bath Thyme Boutique! Shop our collections of soaps, bath bombs, bubble scoops, lip balms, soy wax melts, and more. These make the best gifts, party favors, and don't forget to pamper yourself.

layout.text:
Handcrafted Bath and Body Products 
Made with Love
